channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Contractor has not replaced the bricks, 25th September
item.description:
The contractor has finished the work at the junction of Poolman St and Timber Pond Rd. They have laid tarmac and not put the bricks back. This is unacceptable. Please ensure the contractor returns and returns the road to its former state.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Poolmans Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Člověk to John Ruskin Street

item.title: Overgrown bushes, 25th September
item.description:
Overgrown bushes on Perry Street between tanners court and Crayford arrows end - horses field - blocking the pavement and pedestrians having to walk close to edge

item.title: Not fixed!, 25th September

Can you take off

item.title: O/s 63-67 Wynford Way, fly tipping, 25th September
item.description:
I reported last week, fly tipping o/s the above address. You collected the container of oil but failed to pick up the small gas tank beside it. Please remove asap plus some rusty metal that has been left on the other side of the gateway. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wynford Way, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overspilling bins, 25th September
item.description:
Beckenham Park Hotel constantly has bins that are overspilling onto their forecourt and the pavement around the hotel. It’s revolting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copers Cope Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Overgrown trees, blocking footpath, 25th September
item.description:
Overgrown vegetation obstructive to the footpath. Over grown shrubs, bushes obstructive to seeing who is coming from that path. Was reported by phone in August and unfortunately nothing done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 140, Maple Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unfinished roadworks, 25th September
item.description:
The road was half dug up outside no. 11 West Square over a week ago and then left. It said it would be 3 days and it's now been 8. We can't use the residents car park spaces and there's a huge hole around the drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, West Square, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped suitcase, 25th September
item.description:
Hello, A suitcase has been fly tipped on south East corner the carpark near the bike stands at the end of Eastney Street, please could this be cleared? Many Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Row, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Flytipping, 25th September
item.description:

item.title: Tree needs to be trimmed back, 25th September

item.title: Damaged pavement, 25th September
item.description:
The paving in Lynsted close is dangerous and resident fell over and she hurt her face chin and forehead The paving was cracked raised and a trip hazard . This needs urgent attention, it was also reported to out hours ref 252944 last night about 5.25pm
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynsted Close, Bexley, London

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Gipsy Road, Welling, London

item.title: Further flytipping outside 1B Belfast Road, 25th September
item.description:
Couch and other rubbish dumped onto the street. Twice in one day.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Belfast Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Blocked Drains between Albert and Chelsea bridges, 25th September
item.description:
I have reported blocked drains westbound carriageway Chelsea to Albert bridges. Large puddles develop and it is dangerous to cyclists like me who have to swerve into the traffic. TfL repeatedly say the problem is either fixed or that they don’t maintain this road. RBKC also insists it does not maintain this road. Whomever is responsible for maintenance should fix the blocked drains please!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chelsea Embankment, Chelsea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Greenland Mews, New Cross Gate, London
